bibl.title: New von Scherling Papyri in Uppsala
bibl.note: Batch of papyri (numbered 2-10) now in the University Library at Uppsala, in the Manuscript and Music Department, under call number Y 6:46. - [1. Left open.] - 2. P. Coll. privées: P. von Scherling Inv. G 109. List of Names. 2nd or 3rd century CE. - 3. Inv. G 145. Cession of Ownership Rights. 1st century BCE. - 4. Inv. G 39. Private Letter. 1st or 2nd cent. CE. - 5. Inv. G 19. Two (?) Private Letters. 4th cent. CE. - 6. Inv. G 135. Census Declaration from Oxyrhynchus. 131/2, or 145/6 CE. - 7. Inv. G 21. Receipt and List of Taxpayers (?). 2nd cent. CE. - 8. Sans No. d'Inv. Declaration of Death from Soknopaiou Nesos. Second or first half of the 3rd cent. CE. - 9. Inv. G 214. Private Letter. I-III CE. - 10. Inv. G 110 + 111. Two Christian (?) Literary Texts. - Pp. 77-78, fig.: Appendix [by Renate Dekker]. Inv. C 117. Coptic Letter. Middle Egypt, seventh / eighth cent.
bibl.seg: 141.13 P. Coll. privées: P. von Scherling Inv. C 117 141.4 P. Coll. privées: P. von Scherling Inv. G 19; 21; 39; 109; 110 + 111; 135; 145; 214; sans No. d'Inv.
Klaas A. Worp, New von Scherling Papyri in Uppsala.

Batch of papyri (numbered 2-10) now in the University Library at Uppsala, in the Manuscript and Music Department, under call number Y 6:46. - [1. Left open.] - 2. P. Coll. privées: P. von Scherling Inv. G 109. List of Names. 2nd or 3rd century CE. - 3. Inv. G 145. Cession of Ownership Rights. 1st century BCE. - 4. Inv. G 39. Private Letter. 1st or 2nd cent. CE. - 5. Inv. G 19. Two (?) Private Letters. 4th cent. CE. - 6. Inv. G 135. Census Declaration from Oxyrhynchus. 131/2, or 145/6 CE. - 7. Inv. G 21. Receipt and List of Taxpayers (?). 2nd cent. CE. - 8. Sans No. d'Inv. Declaration of Death from Soknopaiou Nesos. Second or first half of the 3rd cent. CE. - 9. Inv. G 214. Private Letter. I-III CE. - 10. Inv. G 110 + 111. Two Christian (?) Literary Texts. - Pp. 77-78, fig.: Appendix [by Renate Dekker]. Inv. C 117. Coptic Letter. Middle Egypt, seventh / eighth cent.
